text: Ion Constantin Brătianu (June 2, 1821 – 16 May, 1891) was a Romanian politician. He is considered the greatest Romanian politician of the 19th century, and was Prime-Minister of Romania for 12 years (1876-1881 and 1881-1888). He was the father of Ion I. C. Brătianu. ==References== Category:1821 births Category:1891 deaths Category:Romanian politicians
title: Ion Brătianu
